mapper.sql: privilege.privilege_id as privilege_privilege_id, privilege.privilege_name as privilege_privilege_name, privilege.privilege_name_cn as privilege_privilege_name_cn, privilege.privilege_value as privilege_privilege_value, privilege.privilege_category_id as privilege_privilege_category_id
mapper.insert: insert into flow_privilege (privilege_id, privilege_name, privilege_name_cn, privilege_value, privilege_category_id) values (#{privilegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilegeNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilegeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilegeCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into flow_privilege
privilege_id,
privilege_name,
privilege_name_cn,
privilege_value,
privilege_category_id,

mapper.update:
update flow_privilege
privilege_name = #{privilegeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privilege_name_cn = #{privilegeNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privilege_value = #{privilegeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where privilege_id = #{privilegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
